answers.answer: It is a sugar test! It is meant to check for diabetes and other sugar related problems! The lemon lime taste like flat sprite and it is way better than the others if you have a choice at flavors!! Good luck and don't be nervous!
Yes, its to check for gestational diabetes.. you drinka very sugary drink, and in a certain amount of time have to get your blood drawn.

Oh I c that makes since someone want telling me pee tho not get a blood drawn. An I hate getting my blood draw at the place here they always miss my veins. I had to get poked 12 times yesterday. N I'm hoping it's only once when that time comes to drink a very sugary drink. And I hope I get to choose the flavor Cuz I dont wanna feel like I have to throw up the entire time haha
I like the orange flavor I think it taste like Sunkist and they usually do the test around 28 weeks.

question: Okay so I heard there's a urine test that they do but before hand they make you drink a weird drink n then they make you hold it in for hours. How come they do that and what is that test for?
title: the test where the give you a special drink
